creator: ian@ianbrandt.com
text: It would be nice if org.apache.catalina.startup.Tomcat.addWebApp(...) would process the web application's META-INF/context.xml if found.  The current implementation skips META-INF/context.xml loading, and does not appear to offer any hook to enable it--the StandardContext is instantiated and initialized with a null configFile in the single call to addWebApp(...).

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Enhancement requests with patches tend to get resolved faster than those without.
